casebody.data:
BYRD, et al.
v.
FRANKLIN COUNTY. No. 462A14-1. Supreme Court of North Carolina. Aug. 24, 2015. Mr. Aubrey S. Tomlinson, Jr., Louisburg, for Franklin County. Mr. George B. Currin, Raleigh, for Byrd, Aaron, et al. Mr. Camden R. Webb, Raleigh, for Second Amendment Foundation, Inc.

Opinion

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 12th of August 2015 by Respondent to Amend Certificate of Service on New Brief:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 24th of August 2015."
